attributes.action: Get our NHS workers the correct PPE eqiprment
attributes.additional_details: To help save the lives of those who are caring for those suffering with such a horrible disease and placing those people at risk of infection and infecting their family's we need these doctors and nurses to save lives surely the PM should see this as important as he himself had the virus and who took care of him? The Doctors and nurses who can't have any of the basic PPE Required to stopping the drastic spread of the COVID 19 Virus.
attributes.background: NHS workers have been told to treat patients suffering with COVID19 without sufficient PPE it is ridiculous that the government will call these people hero's and clap at 8pm on a Thursday but when it comes to the health and welfare of our dear NHS they won't supply them with the necessary PPE

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign these petitions calling for the same action: 

Provide all workers dealing with the public PPE to be protected from COVID-19: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/307866

Protect essential workers from contracting and spreading Covid-19: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/306387

Supply PPE to all Health and Social Care workers including community carers: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/314229

Provide adequate PPE equipment for medical professionals working with COVID-19: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/304243

Provide urgent support and PPE to carers during coronavirus crisis: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/312960

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

www.gov.uk/coronavirus
https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

The Government has also created an online service to help you out what you can do if you’re struggling because of coronavirus: https://www.gov.uk/find-coronavirus-support

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips

You can read impartial analysis of the Government response to coronavirus and policy developments here: https://commonslibrary.parliament.uk/coronavirus/

You may also be interested to know that because of the large number of petitions that have been started in relation to coronavirus, the Petitions Committee has been questioning the Government about its response to the coronavirus outbreak.
 
Find out more: https://committees.parliament.uk/work/192/the-governments-response-to-coronavirus/
